title: Caterpillar reaches settlement with IRS for past tax years, without penalty
text:
Caterpillar said the settlement is within the total amount of gross unrecognized tax benefits for uncertain tax positions and enables the company to avoid costs and burdens of further disputes with the IRS.

"We vigorously contested the IRS's application of the 'substance-over-form' or 'assignment-of-income' judicial doctrines and its proposed increases to tax and imposition of accuracy-related penalties," the company said in a securities filing.

Caterpillar reaches settlement with IRS for past tax years, without penalty
